localised_description: Sheer luck or the blessing of your god has given the army plenty of supplies.
A communion with the graces, inspires the army to achieve greatness.
Whan the turuf is thy tour, And thy pit is thy bour, Thy fel and thy whitë throtë, Shullen wormës to notë.
Zealotry has taken over the army. They will strike fear even unto the demons themselves!
The fresh memory of repelling the elven incursion is still with us.
The fresh memory of repelling the lizardmen incursion is still with us.
The fresh memory of repelling the undead pirates incursion is still with us.
You did not avoid the plundering of territory of interest. You are despised by its people.
We have rid the world of destructive corruption.
We have rid the world of unseen corruption.
localised_title: A rat's tail for good luck

localised_description: The ambush failed and we are more alert.
In the fight with a superior adversary, retreat is no shame.
